doc.field: Subseries IV.G. Marketing and partnerships records
Subseries IV.G. Marketing and partnerships records

Subseries IV.G contains marketing, publicity, and partnership records. Materials include news clippings and articles, correspondence, branding campaign planning materials, public relations playbooks, playbooks for particular marketing campaigns, files with partnership records and contracts for particular brands and organizations, and supporter mailings. This subseries also includes a group of literature and marketing samples produced by other organizations and collected by WSF. The organizations collected include non-profits, businesses, and athletic programs. Sample publication types include annual reports, mailings, brochures, and informational guides. Material dates from 1984-2008.
